content:
```text
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

# ERROR TIPS
### Crafting errors due to missing ingredients
- Ensure all required sub-ingredients are available before attempting to craft an item. In the case of crafting an iron-chest, ensure that iron-plates are available in the inventory or can be crafted.
### Insertion errors due to missing items
- Verify that the item you are trying to insert into an entity is actually present in the agent's inventory before calling the `insert_item` function.

# NAMESPACE
```
